text: Marcus Nicolay Paus (born 14 October 1979) () is a Norwegian composer. He is known for his orientation toward tradition, tonality and melody. His work includes chamber music, choral works, solo works, concerts, orchestral works, operas, symphonies, and works for theatre, film and television. ==Awards== *Wessel Prize, 2012 * Composer of the Year Prize of the Norwegian Music Publishers, 2017Dette er vinnerne av Musikkforleggerprisen, Music Norway ==References== Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Norwegian composers
title: Marcus Paus
